headline: Allegion Schedules Conference Call, Webcast to Announce 2025 Third-Quarter Results
summary: DUBLIN, October 07, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, will release its 2025 third-quarter financial results on Thursday, Oct. 23, before the market opens.

headline: Do Options Traders Know Something About Allegion Stock We Don't?
summary: Investors need to pay close attention to ALLE stock based on the movements in the options market lately.
